title: COVID-19 Tracker
about: Collaborative project that displays COVID-19 testing information with up to date information. On the backend there is a daily scheduled pull for data that is pushed into a MySQL database that stores the data in the event that the source data is unavailable. The displayed map has a tool tip that appears on hover of a specific state to display the positive & negative cases as well as the number of deaths currently.

title: Mood Quiz
about: User will fill out a mood questionnaire that will randomly generate a GIF and quote of Kanye of Donald Trump. The gif will be accompanied by a Kanye song.

title: Password Generator
about: Password generator with checkboxes and a form to create password. Has options for lowercase characters, uppercase characters, special characters, numbers, and the length of the password (min 8 characters, max 128 characters). Will alert user if no password options are chosen and if length is too small or too large.
